resources.string:
Conversion Game: A game where you convert measurements given to you in both English and Metric systems.

Distance Game: A game where based off your GPS coordinates you have to calculate how far you are away from a land mark.

Conversion Game

A question will appear at the top of your screen asking you to convert some measurement. Click on the blinking cruiser/blank box to bring up your keyboard. Type in your guess than hit the Submit button.

Once submitted results of your last guess will be displayed below. If it is the last question in the series then a results screen will pop up displaying all your results from that round.

Distance Game

Choose your options and when thegame starts, enter your guess for how far you believe you are from the shown landmark.

Be carefull, measurements can be in either metric or standard!

At the end, make sure you review your results so you can learn the actual distance to the landmark!
